about_the_game:
The Battle of Wavre

Sunday, June the 18th and Monday June 19th, 1815

Description:

The battle of Wavre fought on June 18th and 19th, 1815. This DLC contains five scenarios covering this battle where the French right wing under Marshal Grouchy attacked the Prussian rear guard made up of III Corps under Lt. Gen. Thielemann.
